metadata.title: CVE-2018-20376 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Tiny C Compiler (aka TinyCC or TCC) 0.9.27. Compiling a crafted source file leads to an 8 byte out of bounds write in the asm_parse_directive function in tccasm.c.

criterions.comment: tcc package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
